title: Spatial data on the Web Roadmap

pages.title: capture spatial/sensor data
pages.description: Creating spatial data or sensor data in a web context.

pages.title: represent spatial data
pages.description: Vocabularies, formats, to represent spatial data and geometries and to reference locations.

pages.description: Transforming and partitioning of spatial data before or after publication.
